Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Noosa Outrigger Beach Resort in Noosaville (Noosa), you'll be convenient to Noosa Beach and Noosa Marina. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Noosa National Park and Sunshine Beach Village Shops.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 30 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Noosa Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Noosa Marina - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Noosa National Park - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Sunshine Beach Village Shops - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Ed Webb Park - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Eumundi Market - 14.6 km / 9.1 mi
Coolum Beach - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Cooroy Golf Club - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi
Ginger Factory - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 26 km / 16.2 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 28.8 km / 17.9 mi
Big Pineapple - 31.7 km / 19.7 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 32.1 km / 20 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 32.4 km / 20.1 mi

The preferred airport for Noosa Outrigger Beach Resort is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 23.4 km / 14.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
